quote: Your superpower inevitably will become your kryptonite.
why_clipworthy: This statement encapsulates the risk of over-relying on one's strengths without balance.
suggested_hook: Is your greatest strength also your biggest weakness?

quote: Every single breakthrough begins with honest communication.
why_clipworthy: This emphasizes the foundational role of self-awareness in achieving success.
suggested_hook: The key to your next breakthrough might be simpler than you think.
